shortDescription: "Arrays are created without the new keyword"
shortCorrection: "All arrays are allocated on the heap with new"

---

To allocate an array, one does not need to use `new`.
E.g., `Integer[3]` creates a new array of `Integer` of length 3.

frontmatter.shortDescription: Arrays are created without the new keyword
frontmatter.shortCorrection: All arrays are allocated on the heap with new
